title: Collective alignment: public input on our Model Spec
optimized_headline: Public Input Shapes New Model Spec: What Do You Think?
raw_excerpt: OpenAI surveyed over 1,000 people worldwide on how AI should behave and compared their views to our Model Spec. Learn how collective alignment is shaping AI defaults to better reflect diverse human values and perspectives.
raw_body: OpenAI surveyed over 1,000 people worldwide on how AI should behave and compared their views to our Model Spec. Learn how collective alignment is shaping AI defaults to better reflect diverse human values and perspectives.
speedrun: OpenAI recently conducted a survey of over 1,000 people globally to gather insights on how AI should behave. They compared these public opinions to their existing Model Spec, aiming to align AI behavior with diverse human values. This initiative highlights the importance of collective input in shaping AI defaults. Understanding these perspectives is crucial as AI continues to integrate into everyday life.
why_it_matters: This survey allows users to voice their expectations, ensuring AI aligns with their values and needs. It empowers individuals in the AI development process.
The broader shift reflects a growing trend of incorporating public opinion into technology design, potentially leading to more ethical and user-friendly AI systems.

lenses.eli12: OpenAI asked over 1,000 people how they think AI should act. By comparing these views to their AI guidelines, they aim to make AI more in tune with what people want. Think of it like asking a group of friends how to plan a party to ensure everyone enjoys it. This matters because it helps create AI that feels more relatable and trustworthy for everyone.
lenses.pm: For product managers, this survey highlights the need to incorporate user feedback into AI design. Understanding diverse perspectives can reduce friction and enhance user satisfaction. As AI becomes more prevalent, aligning product features with user values could improve adoption and trust, ultimately leading to better business outcomes.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, OpenAI's approach emphasizes the importance of aligning AI behavior with user expectations. By analyzing feedback from over 1,000 respondents, they can refine their Model Spec to better reflect diverse values. This method could lead to more robust and adaptable AI systems, but engineers should consider the complexity of integrating varied human perspectives into model training.
